name: Memoriam (Unfinished Demo)
description:
This is going to be my first Visual Novel! I had never attempted one before, so I had zero idea which areas would require the most time.

Memoriam is about Nat - a boy who lives a life filled with fun and love. He's blessed with lifelong friends and a sense of adventure. Did you know? Nat is going on his first date today! I wonder who it's with...

Short story. Demo contains a brief segment.

Made with Ren'Py.
